typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceJustHeaders
source1 filter(false()) ~> Filter1
Filter1 aggregate(rowcount = count()) ~> rowCount
rowCount split(rowcount == 0,
	disjoint: false) ~> zeroRowsCheck@(zeroRows, default)
sourceJustHeaders keyGenerate(output(rownum as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey1 filter(rownum == 1) ~> Filter2
zeroRowsCheck@zeroRows, Filter2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 filter(rownum == 1) ~> Filter3
Filter3 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['movieheaders.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		each(match(name != 'rowcount' && name != 'rownum'))
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
zeroRowsCheck@default sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['movieheaders.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
